rules: Rule1: Whenever the dispatch server is undergoing a system update, the safety system has an active protocol.
Rule2: Either the dispatch server is undergoing a system update or maintenance of the ground station is complete.

Rule3: Under the condition that maintenance of the ground station is complete, then either manual override is active at the control center or, if the route for drone 001 and package alpha is approved, delivery for package alpha is successful.

Rule4: Provided that test mode is enabled, then if the safety system has an active protocol, either manual override is active at the control center or, under the condition that the route for drone 001 and package alpha is approved, delivery for package alpha is successful.
Rule5: If an alert is issued by the weather sensor, then provided that drone 001 is returning to base, it is in emergency landing.
Rule6: Either an alert is issued by the weather sensor or a storm is detected in zone B.
Rule7: If drone 001 requires rerouting, then provided that it is returning to base, it is in emergency landing.
Rule8: If the command is acknowledged by the control center, then whenever a storm is detected in zone B, drone 001 requires rerouting.

Rule9: If override is authorized for the admin user, then under the condition that the safety system has an active protocol, either manual override is active at the control center or, if the route for drone 001 and package alpha is approved, delivery for package alpha is successful.
Rule10: Whenever an alert is sent to the security team, a security breach is logged.

Rule11: Provided that drone 001 has functional navigation, then under the condition that it is not the case that the delivery for package alpha is not successful implies drone 001 is not operational, delivery for package alpha is completed.
Rule12: Provided that weather in zone A is clear, airspace in zone A is open.
Rule13: If airspace in zone A is open, then drone 001 has traffic light.
Rule14: Provided that drone 001 has traffic light, then under the condition that it has sufficient battery, it has functional navigation.
Rule15: Either the route for drone 001 and package alpha is approved or drone 001 has a backup route for package alpha.
Rule16: Whenever drone 001 has a backup route for package alpha, delivery for package alpha is successful.

Rule17: Provided that it is not the case that the safety system has an active protocol implies either manual override is active at the control center or, under the condition that the route for drone 001 and package alpha is approved, delivery for package alpha is successful, then drone 001 is returning to base.

Rule18: If it is not the case that the safety system has an active protocol implies either manual override is active at the control center or, provided the route for drone 001 and package alpha is approved, delivery for package alpha is successful, then it is not the case that drone 001 is in emergency landing.

Rule19: Provided that it is not the case that the absence of the condition that if the control center has a stable connection, then the command is acknowledged by the control center implies the control center is undergoing a system reboot, the control center has an active backup.

Rule20: If it is not the case that the absence of the condition that if the control center has a stable connection, then the command is acknowledged by the control center implies the control center is undergoing a system reboot, then it is not the case that the control center has an active backup.
Rule21: Provided that it is not the case that override is not authorized for the admin user implies access is denied to the admin user, an alert is sent to the security team.
Rule22: The delivery for package alpha is not successful implies drone 001 is operational.
facts: Fact2: The control center has a stable connection.
Fact4: Weather in zone A is clear.
Fact5: It is not the case that manual override is active at the control center.
Fact6: It is not the case that delivery for package alpha is completed.
Fact7: It is not the case that the control center is undergoing a system reboot.
Fact8: It is not the case that access is denied to the admin user.
Fact9: It is not the case that a security breach is logged.

question: Delivery for package alpha is successful.
